data.title: PhysicalThing: hospitalization lab result
data.text:
Definition:

noun. Hospitalization lab result refers to the outcome of laboratory tests conducted during a patient's stay in a hospital. These tests are typically performed to aid in the diagnosis, monitoring, and treatment of various medical conditions. Hospitalization lab results can include blood tests, urine tests, imaging tests, genetic tests, and other specialized tests. The results are analyzed by medical professionals to determine the patient's health status and provide appropriate medical care and treatment. GPT3.5

Word Forms:

noun. hospitalization lab result (singular), hospitalization lab results (plural)

verb. hospitalization lab result (simple present), hospitalization lab resulted (simple past), hospitalization lab resulting (present continuous), hospitalization lab results (third person singular)

Policy Examples:

Examples of the types of information you can store in a record include: fitness-related activities such as aerobic sessions measurements such as blood glucose and blood pressure discharge summaries from hospitalizations lab results medications health history You can use Programs to enter a wide range of health information into a record.You can give Programs permission to view, add, modify, and/or delete information in a record. #healthvault
